description:
Confuser is a protector/obfuscator for .NET, providing great security to .NET Applications.
Confuser is not being actively maintained. Please use the successor [ConfuserEx](https://yck1509.github.io/ConfuserEx/) instead!

Features
--------
* Anti debugger
* Anti memory dumping
* Anti decompiler
* Prevent any tampering of the assemblies
* Encrypt codes
* Encrypt constants (i.e. numbers and strings)
* Encrypt resources
* Control flow obfuscation
* External/Internal reference proxy
* Renaming
author: Ki
